TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebControlToolboxItem extends System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem

Docs.summary: Provides a base class for a Web server control <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks WebControlToolboxItem provides a base class for toolbox items that create Web server controls. This class extends <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and provides the following additional methods:
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A> gets the value of an attribute of the toolbox item.
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A> gets the HTML that represents the initial state of the control.
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A> gets the type of the associated runtime component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> is set to a short version of the type name.

Docs.param: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> for the current design document.
Docs.summary: Creates objects from each type contained in this <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>, and adds them to the specified designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CreateComponentsCore always throws an exception, indicating that the method is inherited from <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and only intended for use with Windows Forms.

The type of attribute to retrieve the value of.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of the specified type of attribute of the toolbox item.
Docs.returns: The value of the specified type of attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the parameter is anything other than a <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>.
